numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice a higher percentage of players of color than head coaches of color.
2. I wonder why the percentage of head coaches of color is low.
4. This situation shows a lack of equality between players and coaches.
5. Many black people have a dream of becoming successful.
6. Some black people worry that this dream might not happen because of the color of their skin.
7. The headline is: Sports and its lack of diversity.
